verses.roman:
śrī-bhagavān uvāca
mā bhair jare tvam uttiṣṭha
kāma eṣa kṛto hi me
yāhi tvaṁ mad-anujñātaḥ
svargaṁ su-kṛtināṁ padam

synonyms: śrī-bhagavān uvāca—the Supreme Personality of Godhead said; mā bhaiḥ—do not fear; jare—O Jarā; tvam—you; uttiṣṭha—please get up; kāmaḥ—the desire; eṣaḥ—this; kṛtaḥ—done; hi—indeed; me—My; yāhi—go; tvam—you; mat-anujñātaḥ—given permission by Me; svargam—to the spiritual world; su-kṛtinām—of the pious; padam—the abode.
translation: The Supreme Personality of Godhead said: My dear Jarā, do not fear. Please get up. What has been done is actually My own desire. With My permission, go now to the abode of the pious, the spiritual world.
